open-forms-embed.label: Choose an Embedded Open Form
open-forms-embed.description: Upon selecting a form, its unique identifier (UUID) will be stored in the database for future reference.
open-forms-embed.disabled.placeholder: This field is disabled until necessary settings are configured.
open-forms-embed.disabled.hint: Please ensure the required settings (OPEN_FORMS_API_URL and OPEN_FORMS_API_TOKEN) are properly configured to enable this field.
